thread.title: My Linh’s daughter talked about her conversation with Mr. Tim Cook
thread.title_full: My Linh’s daughter talked about her conversation with Mr. Tim Cook

author: times news cr
title: My Linh’s daughter talked about her conversation with Mr. Tim Cook
text:
His image Tim Cook – Apple CEO My Linh and My Anh in Hanoi are receiving the attention of many audiences. On his personal page, posting a photo of two Vietnamese female singers, the billionaire wrote: “Hello, Vietnam! Thank you to talented artists My Linh and My Anh for welcoming me so warmly. I love egg coffee.”
Apple CEO drinks coffee with My Linh and My Anh. Photo: Mr. Tim Cook. My Anh shared above Znews , she and her mother met the Apple CEO thanks to a multinational music corporation based in Vietnam connecting with the billionaire. My Linh’s daughter also revealed the content of the conversation related to people, life in Hanoi and music.
“My mother and I shared with my uncle about Hanoi, its people, and its lifestyle. My family has an artistic tradition, for many generations we have chosen Hanoi because every corner of the capital is peaceful and the gentle Vietnamese people give me and my mother a lot of inspiration to create.
For my family, Hanoi has good and beautiful melodies everywhere. Through the opportunity to chat and cooperate with Apple Music, I want to bring those Vietnamese sounds to the world.” Znews quoted My Anh.
Diva My Linh’s side reshared her post CEO Tim Cook and wrote: “It’s a great morning to welcome Mr. Tim Cook in the place where my mother and I were born and raised – our beloved Hanoi!”. Additionally, in an interview with Dan Tri My Linh expressed that Mr. Tim Cook in real life is very respectable and friendly.
After My Linh – My Anh, CEO Apple will meet rapper Suboi.
Watch video: “Releasing a funny dancing clip, My Linh makes netizens crazy”
